message: So... I think it will be clear from the nature of my questions that I have a MASSIVE amount left to learn
What I'm debating between is having each cell link open a browser window which is simply a single  page which is the .pdf of the year's magazine
It is just going to be an app where you can view the various years of my school's literary magazine
any advice?
I'm basically just trying to decide what the best way to organize my app will be
So far (from my current knowledge) I'm planning on just using the table view format, with each different cell being a different year
or if I should actually put the pdf's in my app and have each cell link to the file (honestly I'm not even sure yet if this is something you can do)
depends. on how important is offline access, on how big the pdf file is (jumping from year to year wouldn't be fun if it has strenuous load time)
or do both... has a download link on each cell that'll download the whole pdf on to phone...
Hi. You shouldn't put the pdf's in your app "by hand", that's the worst option. If you don't want to use the web view (for any reason unwrangle gave), your app should download them dynamically.

It's not so bad to have a list of pdf's bundled with your app.  The main downside is that your app will be bigger, and if it's over a certain limit (used to be 10 megs, not sure if it's larger now), users will have to d/l via wifi, not 3G.  The upside of bundling pdf's in your app is that users will never have d/l anything again, and it will be faster to use.  I don't see any other major issues.  UIWebView is a very easy way to display the pdf's within your app.  Also, if you decide to put the pdf's on a server, you could consider just having a website instead of an app.
p.s. this article seems to have some good nuggets of advice http://www.macresearch.org/cocoa-scientists-xxx-developing-iphone
@unwrangle That would be the best if I could figure it out...
for now I think I won't bundle the pdf's, but I might do it in a later version
There's an other downside to bundled PDF's : what will you do when there's a new edition of your magazine? You will need to update your app and submit to Apple, again.
Plus, there's a lot you can do to have a better audience, such as notifications to remind users to check new releases of your magazines.
i thought it was a yearly mags,.. pushing content update every year wouldn't  be that big of a deal...
Yup, it'll just be once a year.
Oh, I haven't seen that, thought it was many mags, and years were a way to find one particular release.
Ooh I forgot to post here when I finished my app.  I ended up just making an image of each page instead of PDFs
Here it is if you want to check it out :) http://t.co/XaXBthZ
